summary: King Jeongjo (Hyun-Bin) attempts to protect his royal powers from the conflict of two factions: Noron and Soron.
cast: Hyun Bin|Jae-yeong Jeong|Jo Jung-Suk|Jung Eun-chae|Park Sung-Woong|Jae-Hyun Cho|Cheol-woo Han|Ji-min Han|Han Soo Hyun|Sung-ryung Kim|Dong-yong Lee|Jae-Hee Lee|Young-chang Song|Yoo-Bin Sung
title: Yeok-rin
